alert.note: Alert for Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:52AM EST until December 20 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mettawee River at Granville. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Major flood stage. Water approaches County Route 12. Several feet of water on Upper Turnpike Road and Gray Lane. All low-lying fields underwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 9.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Mettawee River Granville Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 10 am: 5.6 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 6.6 Mon 7 pm 9.5 Tue 1 am 9.2 Tue 7 am 8.4 Tue 1 pm 7.5 Tue 7 pm 7.0 Wed 1 am 6.6 Wed 7 am 6.2 Wed 1 pm 6.1 Wed 7 pm 6.0 Thu 1 am 5.8 Thu 7 am 5.7 &&
